mapper.select: SELECT rb.MEMBER_EMAIL , M.MEMBER_NAME , M.MEMBER_NICK , M.MEMBER_IMAGE , RB.RECIPE_COUNT FROM "MEMBER" m , (SELECT MEMBER_EMAIL ,count(*) RECIPE_COUNT FROM RECIPE_BOARD GROUP BY MEMBER_EMAIL) rb WHERE m.MEMBER_EMAIL = rb.MEMBER_EMAIL ORDER BY rb.RECIPE_COUNT DESC , m.MEMBER_EMAIL ASC
